鶨鶨鶨

鶨字的基本解释

鶨
chuàn
古书上说的一种勾嘴鸟。亦称“痴鸟”。

鶨
zhì
古同“雉”，野鸡。

鶨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuàn］
［《廣韻》丑戀切，去線，徹。］
［《廣韻》徒困切，去慁，定。］
鸟名。

鶨字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鶨； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1495第19
【唐韻】丑絹切【集韻】寵戀切，?音猭。鳥名。【爾雅·釋鳥】鶨，䳢老。【郭註】鳹鶨也。俗呼爲癡鳥。【疏】鶨，一名䳢老。字林云：句喙鳥。又【廣韻】【集韻】?徒困切，音鈍。又【集韻】吐玩切，音彖。義?同。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋鳥】鶨，䳢老。【郭註】鴒鶨也。〕　謹照原文鴒鶨改鳹鶨。
鶨字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鶨字的起名意思

暂无。

鶨
Basic explanation of words
鶨
chuàn
A kind of hook-beaked bird mentioned in ancient books. Also known as "the idiot bird."
鶨
zhì
Ancient Tong "pheasant", pheasant.
鶨
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chuàn］
["Guangyun" ugly love is cut, go to the line, thoroughly. ]
["Guangyun" is only sleepy and cut, go away and settle. ]
The name of the bird.
鶨
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鶨; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1495 Page 19
[Tang Yun] Ugly Silk Cut [Ji Yun] Dove love to cut,? Yin Yun. The name of the bird. 【Erya·Shiniao】鶨, old man. [Guo's Note] It is also a bird. It is commonly called a silly bird. 【Sparse】鶨, an old man. Word Lin Yun: sentence beak bird. And [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? It's only sleepy and blunt. Also [Jiyun] spit, play and cut, the sound is 彖. Righteous? Same. Textual research: [【Erya·Shiniao】鶨, old man. [Guo's Note] The 鸰鶨 also. 〕 　I would like to change the 鸰鶨 according to the original text.
鶨
Source glyph
Character evolution: Xiaozhuan
Italics
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Hong Kong Mingti
Korean Ming Dynasty
鶨
Name meaning
Nothing.
chuàn, zhì
chuàn
чуань (птица с изогнутым клювом, которую также зовут «глупой птицей»)
zhì
см. 雉
